law.catch_line: Revocation Of Or Administrative Sanctions Upon License

text.section: failure to observe any term of such license;
failure to meet any requirement for such license established under section five;
failure to observe any order made under authority of this chapter or under other statutory authority vested in the department;
engaging in, or aiding, abetting, causing, or permitting, any action prohibited under section eight; or
other proper cause set forth in regulations made under this chapter.
